title: Diagnostic Performance of PSMA PET/MRI in Characterizing LI-RADS 3 Observations in Patients with Cirrhosis.
abstract: Liver Imaging Reporting and Data System (LI-RADS) category 3 (LR-3) observations remain indeterminate and often result in repeated follow-up or biopsy. Prostate-specific membrane antigen (PSMA) is overexpressed in hepatocellular carcinoma (HCC) neovasculature and may serve as a useful imaging biomarker. This study aimed to evaluate whether [
